Title: Requires wireless communication method service providers disable services to stolen wireless communication methods
Summary: Enacts Detective Brian Simonsen's law; requires police officers report stolen wireless communication methods to wireless communication method service providers who must then disable such stolen wireless communication methods.
LawCode: Add ยง845-e, Exec L; add ยง399-eee, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the general business law, in relation to requiring wireless communication method service providers disable services to stolen wireless communication methods
